attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: REDUCE THE VAT ON DEISEL AND PETROL TO 5% IN LINE WITH OTHER FUELS. THIS WAS ONE OF THE FIRST MOVES BY THE FIRST BLAIR GOVERNMENT AND THEREFORE IN LINE WITH PREVIOUS POLICY ON FUELS. THE CURRENT PRICE OF FUEL IS HITTING TRANSPORT COSTS, PENSIONERS AND RURAL COMMUNITIES VERY HARD INDEED AND THEIR IS NO PROSPECT OF THE PRICE EVER COMING DOWN TO A REALISTIC LEVEL AGAIN.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
